price: 10. Mu’miniintu waa uun walaalo3. ee  heshiisiiya walaalihiin, Allena ka cabsada, si uu idiinku naxariisto.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
footnotes: 3. Nabigu s.c w wuxuu yidhi: Muslimka waa walaalka Muslimka, waa inuusan ku gardarroon, hagran, u gacan gelin cadow, wax ka beensan, qofka muslimka ah waa ka xaaraan muslimka kale: maalkiisa, sharafkiisa, xoolahiisa, xilahiisa, iyo dhiiggiisuba, waxaana shar ugu filan qof inuu quursado walaalki Muslimka ah”.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-mu'minūna ikh'watun fa-aṣliḥū bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
